Script for Nurse

Room 4 – Nurses Station

Alicia Droid: It looks like a nurse's station.
Alicia Droid: She may call security if I'm spotted.
[NURS] Nurse: Hey Marsha. Yeah, I'm still at work. I have desk duty.
[NURS] Nurse: I know... so boring.
[NURS] Nurse: I have to go. I have to watch the floor.
[NURS] Nurse: Byyeee.

Alicia Droid: This pamphlet has the Main operator number.
Alicia Droid: I'll give that a try.
Alicia Droid: 'Doot doot deet doot'
[NURS] Nurse: Hello, St. Mary's Hospital for the Criminally Viral.
[NURS] Nurse: How may I help you?
Alicia Droid: Uh. Yeah. Can you tell me about your services?
[NURS] Nurse: Services? Sure!
[NURS] Nurse: We've been operational for over 25 years.
[NURS] Nurse: We have over 200 beds and 100 rooms for our patients.
Alicia Droid: Now is my chance to go.

[NURS] Nurse: Blah blah blah Blah ....
